activities: Dendreon Corporation receives personal data from the EEA and Switzerland, including data concerning: employees, patients, consumers, physicians and vendors.  These data are collected and transferred to the U.S. in support of the company's employment, research, development, regulatory, marketing, sales, financial, legal and other business activities.
contacttitle1: Associate General Counsel, Pharma Compliance Officer

personaldata: Employees, patients, consumers, physicians and vendors.  Includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: European Union/EEA data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
